Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

05
Aug 2020

Bydd holiadur @Seneddieuenctid ar iechyd meddwl yn cau mewn 4 diwrnod. Sicrhewch eich bod yn cymryd y cyfle i gael #ddweudeichdweud

Yn y lansiad holiadur @GowerCollegeSwa wnaeth pobl ifanc siarad am pa mor bwysig yw edrych mewn i'r pwnc hwn. https://t.co/uQY7TOLp3E pic.twitter.com/QJvp3kqrLa

— Senedd Ieuenctid Cymru (@SeneddIeuenctid) August 4, 2020

holiadur - questionnaire

sicrhewch eich bod - make sure you

pwnc - topic

The @seneddieuenctid questionnaire on mental health will close in 4 days. Make sure you take the opportunity to #haveyoursay. At the questionnaire launch @GowerCollegeSwa young people spoke about how important it is to look into this topic.

04
Aug 2020

Mae'r Farchnad Ddigidol ar agor drwy gydol yr wythnos - y lle perffaith i fynd i chwilio am fargen ac i gefnogi busnesau bach sy'n mynychu'r Eisteddfod. Pob math o stondinau'n hysbysebu'u cynnyrch - https://t.co/UyhDoFEu4K pic.twitter.com/AdPayb6BlH

— eisteddfod (@eisteddfod) August 3, 2020

trwy gydol - throughout

mynychu - attend

hysbysebu - advertise

The Digital Market is open throughout the week - the perfect place to go to search for a bargain and to support small businesses attending the Eisteddfod. All types of stands advertising their products.

03
Aug 2020

Bore da, wythnos nesa bydda i'n ar wyliau yng Nghymru felly, dw i'm moyn gwybod 'ble mae eich hoff gyrchfannau gwyliau yng Nghymru?'

Bydda i'n o gwmpas Penrhyn GÅµyr a Bentywyn. Gobeithio, dw i'n gallu ymweld Ã¢ rhai safleoedd hanesyddol! pic.twitter.com/W3KH1sfs6d

— TheWelshHistorian (@HistorianWelsh) August 1, 2020

cyrchfan wyliau - holiday destination

o gwmpas - around

safleoedd hanesyddol - historic sites

Good morning, next week I will be on holidays in Wales so, I want to know where are your favourite holiday destinations in Wales? I will be around the Gower and Pendine. Hopefully, I can visit some historic sites!

02
Aug 2020

Pier Penarth yn edrych yn hardd yn ei binc ðŸŒ¸

Gall y rhai sy'n cerdded yn Ne Cymru weld y pier pleser o Oes Fictoria ar eu teithiau. Cofiwch gadw at y rheolau ymbellhau cymdeithasol!

ðŸ“· cardiff_wales_snappers#MercherMentro pic.twitter.com/BKeJubg4KM

— Llwybr Arfordir Cymru / Wales Coast Path (@WalesCoastPath) July 29, 2020

hardd - beautiful

rheolau - rules

ymbellhau cymdeithasol - social distancing

Penarth Pier looking pretty in pink. Those walking in South Wales can see the Victorian era pleasure pier on their travels. Remember to keep to the social distancing rules!

01
Aug 2020

Wyddoch chi fod plastig wediâ€™i ddyfeisio ym 1907 ac, ers 1950, mae dros 8.3 biliwn tunnell o blastig wediâ€™i greu?

Rydym ni wedi dysgu cymaint gan Laura o @sascampaigns, am hanes plastig, ei fanteision aâ€™i anfanteision. ðŸŒŠ#GorffennafDiBlastig #WythnosSIChttps://t.co/R6HmENRmSC

— Y Pierhead (@YPierhead) July 20, 2020

wyddoch chi - did you know

dyfeisio - invent

mantais - advantage

Did you know that plastic was invented in 1907 and, since 1950, over 8.3 billion tons of plastic has beeen created? We have learnt so much from Laura @sascampaigns, about the history of plastic, its advantages and its disadvantages.
